name: CLLocationAccuracy
desc: The accuracy of a geographical coordinate.

items.name: let kCLLocationAccuracyBestForNavigation: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: The highest possible accuracy that uses additional sensor data to facilitate navigation apps.

items.name: let kCLLocationAccuracyBest: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: The best level of accuracy available.

items.name: let kCLLocationAccuracyNearestTenMeters: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: Accurate to within ten meters of the desired target.

items.name: let kCLLocationAccuracyHundredMeters: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: Accurate to within one hundred meters.

items.name: let kCLLocationAccuracyThreeKilometers: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: Accurate to the nearest three kilometers.

items.name: let kCLLocationAccuracyReduced: CLLocationAccuracy
items.desc: The level of accuracy used when an app isnâ€™t authorized for full accuracy location data.
